plan.description: This layout establishes a clear work-first environment by positioning the table as the hero piece, immediately visible upon entry against the far windowed wall. The bed is relocated to a side wall, de-emphasizing it and keeping it out of the primary sightline from the door. This creates a direct, motivating path to the workspace, with distinct zones for sleep and relaxation on the periphery.

furniture_placement.table_1: Centered on and flush against the south wall, positioned between the two windows.
furniture_placement.chair_1: Placed at table_1 on the west side, with its back to the center of the room.
furniture_placement.chair_2: Placed at table_1 on the east side, with its back to the center of the room.
furniture_placement.bed_1: Positioned in the southeast corner, with the headboard flush against the east wall. This places the bed in the corner furthest from the entry door and the desk.
furniture_placement.nightstand_1: Placed against the east wall, on the north side of bed_1.
furniture_placement.nightstand_2: Placed between bed_1 and the south wall.
furniture_placement.sofa_1: Positioned flush against the west wall, in the area south of the kitchen fixtures. This keeps the central pathway to the desk clear.
furniture_placement.artwork_1: Mounted on the west wall, centered above sofa_1.
furniture_placement.artwork_2: Mounted on the east wall, centered above bed_1.
furniture_placement.plant_1: Placed in the southwest corner of the room, to the left of table_1.
furniture_placement.rug_1: Placed on the floor in front of the west-side window on the south wall, partially under table_1.
furniture_placement.rug_2: Placed on the floor in front of the east-side window on the south wall, partially under table_1.

plan.door_clearance: The central corridor of the room is kept entirely open, providing a direct and unobstructed path from the door on the north wall to the table on the south wall.

zone_arrangement.work_zone: The work zone is the primary focus, occupying the full width of the south wall, making it the destination point from the entrance.
zone_arrangement.sleep_zone: The sleep zone is located along the west wall, tucked away from the main entryway and separate from the work zone.
zone_arrangement.living_zone: The living zone is situated along the east wall, creating a separate space for relaxation that does not impede the flow to the work area.
